snippet: The system’s leaders said their central goal was to teach Kaiser’s model of integrated care to a new generation of doctors.
abstract: Health system Kaiser Permanente says it will open its own medical school in California in 2019.
lead_paragraph: The system’s leaders said their central goal was to teach Kaiser’s model of integrated care to a new generation of doctors.

headline.main: Kaiser Permanente Plans to Open a Medical School
headline.print_headline: Kaiser Permanente Plans to Open a Medical School
